name: intervisibility
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If there is intervisibility between two or more objects, each of the objects can be seen from all the others: The system analyses patterns of intervisibility between sites. Inter-visibility is an important consideration at places where flows of traffic cross each other. Related word
intervisible
More examplesFewer examplesThe distance must be increased to improve inter-visibility and prevent accidents.The mound was built so as to achieve intervisibility with other vantage points in the region.There was a high degree of intervisibility between the sanctuaries on the mountain tops.Researchers are able to examine orientation, intervisibility and other visual effects.
